current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_circumstances: John Doe #13-79 is a male adult (probably White) found mummified within a tunnel formed by hay bails on a ranch.  Cause of death could not be determined.  He had gray hair and was estimated to have weighed approximately 145 lbs and stood 6 feet.  Identity can be established by fingerprints, dental records (CA DOJ-MUPS), and DNA (CODIS #BK-05-000848).
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: Sweatshirt (zip-up), blue Levi pants (secured by black belt with large metal buckle), grey "military-type" socks
case_footwear: Tan "Hush-Puppy" type shoes found with body
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
